item.description:
@Joea wrote:

[quote=“xlogga123, post:2, topic:322881”]yes becuse armadyl god sword is id 35 and bandos godsword is id 667 lol
on a 317 server u cant have more than ****num in id[/quote]

Hmmm… Still does it.
Do you think it maybe the client? i am running 2 clients at once because i am not putting it on the internet yet.
So what do you think?

item.title: Special on players with godswords
item.dc:creator: @Joea Joea
item.description:
@Joea wrote:

Can someone help?

Source:
Deltascape 317

Client:
Galkons 317

Problem:
Special attack on players with godswords freeze up my client.

Info:
Players Special in Client.java is…

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15333 && specialAmount > 49){//armadyl godsword
setAnimation(3547);
specialAmount -= 50;
hitDiff = 10 + misc.random(65);
getHit(30);
specOn = false;
lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis();
specGFX(651);
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15334 && specialAmount > 99){//bandos godsword
specialAtkNPC(false, 100, 600, 2927);
hitDiff = 10 + misc.random(50);
specGFX(590);
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15336 && specialAmount > 74){//zamorak godsword
specialAtkNPC(false, 75, 600, 2927);
stillgfx(592, EnemyY, EnemyX);
hitDiff = 10 + misc.random(50);
stillgfx(644, absY, absX);
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15335 && specialAmount > 49){//saradomin godsword
specialAtkNPC(false, 50, 600, 2927);
specGFX(656);
hitDiff = 10 + misc.random(50);
currentHealth += hitDiff;
playerLevel[5] += 5 + misc.random(10);
if (currentHealth > playerLevel[playerHitpoints])
currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
sendQuest("" + currentHealth + “”, 4016);
if (playerLevel[5] > getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]))
playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]);
sendQuest("" + playerLevel[5] + “”, 4012);
}

Can it maybe becuase of the id’s? They are 15000 and above…

Read full topic
